Why Choose Our Aesthetic Center?

At Dr. Tatiana Leal's Aesthetic Center, every treatment is backed by years of experience and cutting-edge technology. We are dedicated to enhancing your natural beauty safely and effectively.

  • Certified medical team with over 15 years of experience
  • State-of-the-art technology approved by FDA and INVIMA
  • Customized protocols for optimal results
  • Continuous patient follow-up
  • Controlled and safe medical environment

Your natural beauty enhanced

We don't aim to change who you are, but rather enhance your natural beauty by addressing those small imperfections that concern you. Each treatment is designed with you and your specific goals in mind.

Frequently Asked Questions

Absolutely. All our treatments are approved by health authorities (FDA and INVIMA) and are performed by specialist physicians in a controlled medical environment. We conduct a complete evaluation before any procedure to ensure your safety.

Duration varies depending on the treatment and individual factors such as lifestyle and aftercare. Generally:

  • Facial treatments: 4-6 months
  • Dermal fillers: 12-18 months
  • Body treatments: progressive and lasting results with maintenance

Most of our treatments are non-invasive and allow you to immediately return to your activities. Some procedures may cause slight redness that disappears within a few hours.
